name: PONG 2D (habibuoy)
description:
Enjoy the classic Pong game with a better visual. Play on your own or with your friend. Get a power-up to help you win the game.

---------------------------------------------------

CONTROL

Singleplayer - [W] key to move up and [S] key to move down.

Multiplayer - UP arrow to move up and DOWN arrow to move down.
